sight.label: Sight
sight.hint: Configure the detection modes that this limit applies to.

light.label: Light
light.hint: Configure whether this limit applies to light sources.

darkness.label: Darkness
darkness.hint: Configure whether this limit applies to darkness sources.

sound.label: Sound
sound.hint: Configure whether this limit applies to sound sources.

range.label: Range
range.hint: Configure the range of this limit.

mode.label: Mode
mode.hint: Configure how the range of this limit affects the effective range.

priority.label: Priority
priority.hint: Configure the order in which limits are applied to determine the effective range.

STACK.label: Stack
STACK.hint: The effective range is reduced further by this limit.

UPGRADE.label: Upgrade
UPGRADE.hint: The effective range is increased to the range of this limit.

DOWNGRADE.label: Downgrade
DOWNGRADE.hint: The effective range is decreased to the range of this limit.

OVERRIDE.label: Override
OVERRIDE.hint: The effective range is overridden by the range of this limit.
